body_text:
Can Brook have another Devil Fruit? As per One Piece logic, a person cannot have 2 Devil Fruit powers. 
The Yomi Yomi no Mi fruit revives the one who eats it. The powers of this fruit are a one-time use, and has been used up after Brook was revived. Can Brook now have another Devil Fruit?
What will happen if one person eats two Devil Fruits? If a person has already eaten one Devil Fruit, what will happen to him if he eats another Devil Fruit?
